tool_description: Resizes and optimizes multiple images simultaneously for different social media platform requirements while maintaining quality and aspect ratios.

source_images.description: Array of URLs or paths to source images

target_platforms.description: Target platforms: facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, youtube, tiktok, pinterest

content_type.description: Content type: post, story, cover, profile, thumbnail

maintain_aspect_ratio.description: Whether to maintain original aspect ratio

output_format.description: Output image format: jpg, png, webp

error_messages: Source images not accessible: Ensure all URLs in source_images array point to valid image files.
Invalid platform: Use platforms from [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, youtube, tiktok, pinterest].
Invalid content type: Use one of [post, story, cover, profile, thumbnail].
Quality out of range: Use value between 50 and 100.
Invalid output format: Use one of [jpg, png, webp].
Too many images: Maximum 20 images can be processed in one batch.
usage: Provide source_images array and target_platforms, specify content_type, then adjust quality and format options. The tool processes all images for all specified platforms.

processed_images.description: Array of URLs to processed images organized by platform

platform_specs.description: Specifications used for each platform (dimensions, format)

total_files_created.description: Total number of optimized image files generated
